meaning_str.bing:
v. 溜；偷偷地走；偷偷地做；偷带
adj. 突然的；出其不意的
n. 告状者（尤指儿童）
网络. 潜行；偷窃；偷偷摸摸

溜；偷偷地走；偷偷地做；偷带

溜；偷偷离开；悄悄溜走；偷带；偷走；偷拿；潜行；告密；（儿童向成人）打小报告；偷运
告状者；告密者；打小报告的人
突然的；出其不意的；无预警的

1.en: There was a bunch of grapes next to him, said Professor McGonagall. We think he was trying to sneak up here to visit Potter.
1.cn: 他身边还有一串葡萄，麦格教授说道，我们猜他是想溜到这里来看波特。

2.en: If you can sneak in a quick text or call and hear a familiar voice for a few minutes, it may be just enough to talk you off the ledge.
2.cn: 如果你可以悄悄地发条短信，或者打个电话给这些人，听到他们熟悉的声音，很有可能你就会释然了。

3.en: Jump-ropes and resistance bands are easy to sneak into a suitcase.
3.cn: 跳绳和阻力带都非常容易塞进行李箱。

0.en: And while I'm gone, don't you boys sneak a taste. Okay.
0.cn: 我不在的时候你们可别偷吃。

1.en: Okay, I'm gonna sneak around behind him and you're just gonna keep him talking.
1.cn: 听着，我悄悄地绕到后面去，你继续说话分散他的注意力。

2.en: But don't try to sneak it all in one day. Drinking too much water can actually be dangerous.
2.cn: 但别尝试在一天之内完成，喝太多水其实很危险。

3.en: So I'd like to continue talking about Pearl Harbor and what happened after the sneak attack.
3.cn: 所以我想继续讲讲珍珠港事件以及突袭发生之后的相关历史。

4.en: You know what? You've convinced me. Maybe tonight we should sneak in and shampoo her carpet.
4.cn: 你说的对，也许今晚我们应该偷溜进去把她的地毯洗了。

5.en: Is there some problem? Yeah. Listen, I have to kinda sneak out for a while. All right, good-bye.
5.cn: 有问题灭？对，我得出去一小会。好吧，拜拜。

6.en: The only thing to do was to sneak back to the car and think of a lie to tell my dad along the way.
6.cn: 唯一能做的事就是偷偷溜回车里，想想该编什么谎话骗我爸。

7.en: Well, I never thought of it like that. Boy, frame of reference will just sneak up on you, won't it?
7.cn: 我从未这样想过，天啊，看来你很喜欢跟人抬杠啊？

8.en: And so, under the cover of darkness, and with a false key, Jean-Louis and I sneak into the cathedral.
8.cn: 于是在黑暗中，利用万用钥匙，尚路易和我溜进圣母院。

9.en: Then you two can sneak into the cockpit, and things will start to heat up, and then a stewardess comes in.
9.cn: 然后你们可以溜进驾驶舱，气氛开始变得火热，然后一个空姐进来…

10.en: Do you hear me? At midnight! This gives me the time to sneak over to the North Tower and check the rigging.
10.cn: 听到了吗？午夜！这样我才有空到北塔检查安装情形。

11.en: You rendezvous with Barry. He hides you on his floor until he can sneak you up in the stairwell to the roof.
11.cn: 你们和贝瑞会合，他让你们躲在他那一层，最后让你们溜进往楼顶的楼梯间。

12.en: And then somewhere along the line, four more sneak in, and you think, "We're good. We're cool. We're the cute girls with six cats."
12.cn: 接下来事情便一发不可收拾，又有四只偷偷溜了进来 你心里想"没问题，顶得住，我们是养了六只猫的可爱小姑娘"。

13.en: What, you stole our Bitcoin? Oh, calm down. All I did was sneak onto your computer and download your Bitcoin onto a flash drive. What?
13.cn: 你偷了我们的比特币吗？冷静。我只是偷偷登录了你的电脑把你们的比特币下载到U盘上了。什么？

14.en: Anyway, you got to let me know if you have a plus one. Because if not, my mom's trying to sneak in the doctor who sucked the fat out of her neck.
14.cn: 总而言之，你带不带人来都得赶紧通知我，你不带人的话，位子就让给那位帮我妈脖子做抽脂的医生啦。

15.en: You can unlock doors, sneak past guards climb the wall, but if you don't take out that monkey you ain't going nowhere. You wanna get out of here? Get rid of that monkey!
15.cn: 你可以打开门，绕过守卫爬上墙，但是如果你不制服那只猴子，你就哪儿都别去，你想逃出去吗? 那就除掉那个猴子!

16.en: In high school, I was the master of the silent scare. I could sneak up on a field mouse in a pillow factory. Sorry! They get stickier when I'm sweaty. Oh, my gosh, that's terrible.
16.cn: 我高中时是无声惊吓的高手，我能在枕头工厂偷偷接近田鼠。抱歉，流汗会更黏，我的天，糟透了。
